reviewText: saw this film on youtube a while back and had to order it. 100% respect and love for dwayne wade-the athlete and man behind the scenes of basketball going through a life struggle to get to where he is today. where it all began in chicago, his hometown, to advancing his game as the greatest draft pick in miami heat history. a must have for any wade fan or heat fan.
Perfect video to add to my son's collection. Great documentary! He absolutely loves it! A must have for the basketball enthusiast!
i loved every minute of it i watched it and it made me happy lol im a huge wade fan so it was all good for me i just got it for gp
If you love the Heat, DWade, or just pure NBA brillance, you'll enjoy this one.

i ordered this dvd for my husband. he's a huge nba fan. miami heat is his favorite team, and dwyane wade is his favorite player. i watched the dvd with him. it tells a lot of personal information about wade's childhood, family, and dreams. it also shows a lot about how he became a basketball player and his rise to fame.
if my husband, a HUGE wade fan, loved this dvd, i'm sure any other fan would.

I watched this video not really being a Dwyane Wade fan..but after viewing, one can not help but admiring this young man and his "LIFE" journey!..A tremendous athlete ..A tremendous human being with much to offer!
